propose.from sentence: In this paper , we propose an accelerated robust subset selection method to highly raise the speed on the one hand , and to boost the robustness on the other .

use.from sentence: To this end , we use the p ( 0 < p ? 1 ) - norm based robust measure for the representation loss , preventing large errors from dominating our objective .

based on.from sentence: Then , based on the observation that data size is generally much larger than feature length , i.e. N L , we propose a speedup solver .

owing to.from sentence: The main acceleration is owing to the Augmented Lagrange Multiplier ( ALM ) and an equivalent derivation .
